item.title: Dirty Wars
item.description: [Insert string of obscenities] at the things the United States has done. The best thing this book does is make it perfectly clear there isnâ€™t right-wing or left-wing. It spans two crucial presidencies (Bush II and Obama), and the substantive difference is that the former worried how far they could push things and the latter did not care.
